attributes.action: financially back ALL youth clubs and other sociallising activities for children across the UK, to help prevent them from drink, drugs and crime for them to be doing something more productive, with qualified and paid leaders
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: with the youth causing more and more problems I believe this is due to the lack of things for them to be doing, so providing more youth clubs, financially backing the scout movement more would bring socialising and more good out of what is an already crisis time.
